title: Assalamualaikum Baitullah
overview: Amira, a woman who initially lived happily with the person she loved. However, everything changed when she experienced betrayal and lost someone close to her. Disappointment, devastation, and loneliness made Amira lose her direction in life. She felt heartbroken and found it difficult to recover from deep wounds. In desperation, Amira decided to go to the Holy Land. For Amira, this journey was not just a pilgrimage or an escape from problems, but a search for identity and new hope. In Mecca, Amira tried to make peace with her past, rebuild her fragile heart, and strengthen her spiritual connection with God. During her time in the Holy Land, Amira reflected a lot and discovered the true meaning of life. She also met new people who helped her healing process, including Barra who was always there to support her. This journey slowly transformed Amira into a stronger and more sincere person.
